---
id: put-bacen-webhook
title: "Set up the webhook for the provided key."
description: "Endpoint for configuration of the notifications service regarding received Pix transactions. Only Pix transactions associated with a txid will be notified."
sidebar_label: "Set up the webhook for the provided key."
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"
info_path: reference/pix-merchant/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-pix-merchant-clients
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set up the webhook for the provided key."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/pix-api/v2.x/webhook/{chave}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint for configuration of the notifications service regarding received Pix transactions. Only Pix transactions associated with a txid will be notified.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"chave":{"value":"fulano@gmail.com"}},"name":"chave","description":"The DICT key.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for BacenWebhookRequest","description":"the body to send to set up webhook.","required":["webhookUrl"],"type":"object","properties":{"webhookUrl":{"description":"The URL which the webhook notification will be delivered","type":"string"}},"example":{"webhookUrl":"string"}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
